SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppClient
This class is the launcher of the client side of the application
AppServer
This class is the launcher of the server side of the application
ChatMessage
This class manages the messages exchanged between clients and the server.
CLI
This class handles the view part of the game, more specifically it handles the Command Line Interface (CLI).
CLIController
This class is the controller of the CLI view.
Client
This interface is used to define the methods that the client must implement.
Controller
Controller class is the main class of the game.
ControllerDeserializer
This class is used to deserialize a Controller object from a JSON string.
ControllerSerializer
This class is used to serialize a Controller object into a JSON string.
Corner
This class represents a corner of a card.
Deck
This class represents the deck of cards.
DiagonalPatternObjective
This class represents pattern-oriented objectives, i.e. objectives that give points only if a certain card pattern is present on a given player table.
DiagonalPatternObjectiveSerializer
This class is used to serialize a DiagonalPatternObjective object into a JSON string.
EndGameController
This class is the controller of the end game scene.
GameController
This class is the controller of the game scene.
GameSaver
This class is used to save the current status of the game by the controller.
GoldCard
This class represents all the gold cards.
ItemObjective
This class represents item-oriented objectives, i.e. objectives that give points only if a certain combination of items is present on a given player table.
ItemObjectiveSerializer
This class is used to serialize an ItemObjective object into a JSON string.
Items
This enumeration lists the items.
LShapePatternObjective
This class represents pattern-oriented objectives, i.e. objectives that give points only if a certain card pattern is present on a given player table.
LShapePatternObjectiveSerializer
This class is used to serialize a LShapePatternObjective object into a JSON string.
MainTable
This class represents the common board, and it contains the scoreboard, the drawable cards present on the table and the common objectives.
MainTableDeserializer
This class is used to deserialize a MainTable object from a JSON string.
MainTableSerializer
This class is used to serialize a MainTable object into a JSON string.
ObjectiveDeserializer
Custom deserializer for the Objectives class.
Objectives
This class represents all the objectives in a game with their points,the reference at the front and back image and the items,the resource and the pattern use for make the points.
Observable
 
Observer
 
OldNicknamesDeserializer
Custom deserializer for the player's nicknames on a previous save file.
OtherBoardController
This class is the controller of the other board scene.
PlaceableCard
This abstract class represents all the placeable cards in the game.
PlayerTable
This class represents the player's board, it contains all the card of the player(starting card, played card, secret objective card), the nickName, the id, the first token(if he's first), the point on the board, all the point included the secret objective and the resource counter.
PlayerTableDeserializer
Custom deserializer for the PlayerTable class.
PlayerTableSerializer
Custom serializer for the PlayerTable class.
PreGameController
This class is the controller of the pre-game scene.
ResourceCard
This class represents all the resource cards.
ResourceCardDeserializer
Custom deserializer for the ResourceCard class.
ResourceObjective
This class represents resource-oriented objectives, i.e. objectives that give points only if three occurrences of a particular resource are present on a given player table.
ResourceObjectiveSerializer
Custom serializer for the ResourceObjective class.
Resources
This enumeration lists the resources of a card.
RMIClient
This class represents the client side of the RMI connection.
RMIServer
This class represents the RMI server that manages the connection with the clients.
RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory<T>
Adapts values whose runtime type may differ from their declaration type.
SecretObjController
This class is the controller of the secret objective scene.
SocketClient
This class represents the client side of the socket connection.
SocketClientHandler
This class represents the handler of a client connected to the server via socket.
SocketClientProxy
This class is a proxy for the client, it is used to send messages to the client through the socket.
SocketMessage
This class represents a message that can be sent through a socket connection.
SocketServer
This class represents the server side of the socket connection.
SocketServerProxy
This class is a proxy for the server, it is used to send messages to the client through the socket connection.
StartingCard
This class represents all the starting cards.
StartingCardController
This class is the controller of the starting card scene.
View
 
ViewGui
This class is the GUI view of the game.
VirtualServer
This interface is used to define the methods that the server must implement.
VirtualView
This interface is used to define the methods that the virtual view must implement.
